alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Ross; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:29PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, NORTH CENTRAL BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, SOUTHERN FAYETTE, SOUTHERN CLINTON, NORTHERN HIGHLAND AND WEST CENTRAL ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EST... At 828 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Blanchester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Blanchester, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Woodville, Staunton, Good Hope, Clarksville, Martinsville, Midland, Highland, South Salem, St. Martin, State Route 123 at State Route 132, East Monroe, Samantha and Lees Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Ross; Warren
